code.Name: code
code.Description:
The SmartData element ID

This ID varies depending on what SmartData element is being searched for. The format for this ID is <system>|<SmartData Element>, where each individual SmartData element has its own ID.

The system value is an object identifier (OID) that is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization.

The SmartData element value is the unique SmartData identifier for the SmartData element.

focus.Name: focus
focus.Description: The FHIR ID for the context record that the SmartData element is attached to.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The FHIR ID for the patient the observation is about.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Observation.Name: Observation
Observation.Description: An instance of the R4 Observation resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
Information about the SmartData element including the element reference and display string. If a SNOMED mapping for the SmartData element exists, that mapping appears here as well.
The code element value varies depending on what SmartData element is passed. The system value is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization. In the App Orchard sandbox, use urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.0.1.7.2.707679.

component.Name: component
component.Description: Additional information. The number of components returned equals the number of lines in the SmartData element.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
Information about the SmartData element including the element reference and display string. If a SNOMED mapping for the SmartData element exists, that mapping appears here as well.

The code element value varies depending on what SmartData element is passed. The system value is different between Epic organizations, and it is also different between production and non-production environments for the same organization.

valueBoolean.Name: valueBoolean
valueBoolean.Description: This element is populated if the data type is Boolean.

valueCodeableConcept.Name: valueCodeableConcept
valueCodeableConcept.Description: This element is populated if the data type is database or elementID.

valueDateTime.Name: valueDateTime
valueDateTime.Description: This element is populated if the data type is date or instant.

valueQuantity.Name: valueQuantity
valueQuantity.Description: This element is populated if the data type is numeric.

valueString.Name: valueString
valueString.Description: This element is populated if the data type is string, category, or time with unit.

valueTime.Name: valueTime
valueTime.Description: This element is populated if the data type is time.

focus.Name: focus
focus.Description: The FHIR ID for the context record that the SmartData element is attached to.

hasMember.Name: hasMember
hasMember.Description: Returns nested references to other Observation (SmartData Element) resources.

issued.Name: issued
issued.Description: The date and time the observation was documented.

note.Name: note
note.Description:
This element is returned starting in the November 2021 version of Epic.

The comments for the SmartData element.

If the component and comment are saved to separate SmartData elements, the comment is returned as a separate observation and not as a note on the components observation.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The FHIR ID for the patient the observation is about.
